reviewText: We saw the show in its original TV form in England, and couldn't wait to get it.  It came well before time for delivery, and was in great shape.  Many thanks for the prompt service and great product!  We are enjoying!
Why can't we get this in the United States/Region 1?  I have been waiting forever for it to be released for the US market.  What gives???  Thank you!

This is a wonderful show.  I wish it would be easier to find the whole series.  American television needs to have programs such as this instead of the junk that it broadcasts.  I was first introduced to this show through PBS where they also air many good shows.
Surprisingly better than expected! Great series for just settling in and escaping to another time and place. Love it! 5 stars!
I love this Series.  Why can't we get it in American Format!  Please!!!!!

Would definitely buy again! I have wanted this set for several years. I finally have player that will run region 2 DVDs as well as my blu-ray collections. I hope to deal with this seller again and again.

i have only seen this on tv and not all of it yet. i would love to own the series but can not find it in region 1 . help!!!!! we who live in the states love bbc and a great deal of it we can not get  in region.
This is a great series.  Entertaining and great character development.  I try to watch it anytime it's on PBS.  When will it be released on DVD in Region 1?

Love the series. Would probably be simple for US version DVD to be made.
Many would be sold! With popularity of Downton Abbey this is a natural!
Love this show and all it's characters. Please make it available for Region 1!
I wish that this series that aired on PBS was available in the US -- I would definitely purchase it!
Why isn't this available for purchase? It is better than 99% of the crap on television. We would like to buy it.
